Dewboy, this RPG wouldnt get amde into a cartoon. So much continuity has been 
disrupted it would be hated by most of the fans and likely canceled. And ins 
tarwars if you didnt notice they werent firing 40 shots every five seconds 
they fire small amounts of shots at a time and even then they werent firing 
at everyone that fired at them at the same time. Dewboy ammo limits should eb 
played I know some of the council members agree with this but when or if they 
will do anything has yet to be seen. Also dewboy you seem to be the only 
person whining about why we shouldnt have them. I snapped at cardhead which  
I apologized for mainly because of your lack of logic in this entire matter. 
And more than likely people will see 40 shots being fired sicne msot of the 
time in this RPG there is a battle and half of the battles seem to have 
moderish actions taking place. When I first joined I really thought the RPG 
was a joke, so I decided to cash in and see how far I could possibly go with 
direct powerful tings that could add to the story but also further my 
somewhat sadistic motivations. We saw where that all lead to(Can I get a 
hellpeon please? What about a fury cannon? Any bases need blowing up? Whee). 
Now we have a chance to actually make the RPG better but all you seem to be 
wanting to do is make it worse by ignoring certain logical things such as 
ammo. In most games you have a limit to what you can do. In RPGs you'll have 
MP, in Resident Evil type games you'll have ammo, in first person shooters, 
ammo again, in some games like contra, you have certain amounts of time or 
bullets of a ifferent weapon. All of these things have one particular trait, 
there is always a limit.

--part1_38.29e26678.2a4a0416_boundary
